position: Startup Program Manager / ESA BIC Program Manager

ETH Zürich's startup ecosystem supports companies combining deep tech with AI — directly aligned with multiple Vimo projects
ESA BIC offers financial and technical support plus networking for startups exploiting space-adjacent technologies
Thomas manages both ETH Entrepreneurship programs and ESA BIC Switzerland — high connectivity across Zürich ecosystem
enrichment_data.outreach_angle: Thomas is a gateway to two Swiss institutional programs — ETH's startup support and ESA BIC. For Mirari/AURA (spatial computing, AR overlay on Zurich), the space/positioning technology angle could qualify for ESA BIC consideration. More immediately, Thomas's network across ETH startups gives him visibility into enterprise clients (municipalities, infrastructure) relevant for Kavach AI and Bramha ESG. Given ETH's work in spatial computing, I would love 20 minutes to share what we are doing and get your perspective on whether there is an ESA BIC angle or relevant ETH research connections.'
